title: Themed room/ko
data:
*The following information pertains to an upcoming version ([NetHack 3.7.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.7.0 "NetHack 3.7.0")). If this version is now released, please verify that it is still accurate, then update the page to incorporate this information.*

**테마 방**은 일반 직사각형 방과는 달리 희귀한 방입니다. 일반 랜덤 방 대신 테마 방이 배치되려고 할 확률이 1033분의 33(약 31분의 1)입니다. 테마가 있는 방 중에는 단순히 특이한 모양인 것도 있고, 다른 곳과는 달리 내용이 있는 것도 있습니다. 일부 테마 방은 [특별한 방](/wiki/Special_room "Special room")으로 더욱 변할수가 있습니다.

## 테마 방 목록

| Name                   | Can be special | Normal room contents | Map                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | Notes                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| ---------------------- | -------------- | -------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 일반적인 무작위 방             | Yes            | Yes                  |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | 흔한 직사각형 방입니다.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| 가짜 Delphi              | Yes            | Yes                  |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | A 11×9 room with a 3×3 room in its center, imitating [Delphi](/wiki/Delphi "Delphi").                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| Room in a room         | Yes            | Yes                  |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | A random room with a random subroom                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| Huge room              | Yes            | Yes                  |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | 90% 확률로 subroom을 포함하는 아주 큰 방입니다.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| Ice room               | No             | Yes                  |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | 바닥이 [얼음](/wiki/Ice "Ice")으로 뒤덮여 있습니다.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| Boulder room           | No             | No                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | Each floor space in the room has a 30% chance to have a [boulder](/wiki/Boulder "Boulder") or [rolling boulder trap](/wiki/Rolling_boulder_trap "Rolling boulder trap").                                                                                                                                                                             |
| 거미 둥지                  | No             | No                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | Each floor space in the room has a 30% chance to have a [web](/wiki/Web "Web"), with a [giant spider](/wiki/Giant_spider "Giant spider") sitting on it.                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| Trap room              | No             | No                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | Each floor space in the room has a 30% chance to have a [trap](/wiki/Trap "Trap"). All of these traps will be of the same type, and they may have corpses and possessions on an eligible level. They can be arrow traps, dart traps, falling rock traps, bear traps, land mines, sleeping gas traps, rust traps or anti-magic fields.                |
| Buried treasure        | Yes            | Yes                  |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | 3d4개의 무작위 물체를 포함하는 바닥에 묻힌 [상자](/wiki/Chest "Chest")가 있습니다.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| Massacre               | No             | No                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | There are 5d5 [player monster](/wiki/Player_monster "Player monster") or [quest guardian](/wiki/Quest_guardian "Quest guardian") corpses on the floor.                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| Pillars                | No             | No                   | ------------ \|..........\| \|..........\| \|..--..--..\| \|..--..--..\| \|..........\| \|..........\| \|..--..--..\| \|..--..--..\| \|..........\| \|..........\| ------------                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | The pillars will be [lava](/wiki/Lava "Lava") 1/7 of the time, [water](/wiki/Water "Water") 1/7 of the time or [trees](/wiki/Tree "Tree") 1/7 of the time.                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| Statuary               | No             | No                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | 5d5개의 [석상](/wiki/Statue "Statue")과 d3개의 [석상 함정](/wiki/Statue_trap "Statue trap")이 있습니다.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| Light source           | No             | No                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | 불이 켜진 [기름 램프](/wiki/Oil_lamp "Oil lamp")를 포함하는 항상 어두운 방입니다.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| Temple of the gods     | No             | No                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | There is an [altar](/wiki/Altar "Altar") of each alignment. The room is not an actual [temple](/wiki/Temple "Temple") and does not contain a priest.                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| Mausoleum              | No             | No                   | ------- \|.....\| \|.---.\| \|.\|.\|.\| \|.---.\| \|.....\| -------                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | There is a 50% chance that there will be a [lich](/wiki/Lich "Lich"), [mummy](/wiki/Mummy "Mummy"), [vampire](/wiki/Vampire "Vampire") or [zombie](/wiki/Zombie "Zombie") sealed in the centre of the room; otherwise there will be an [@](/wiki/@ "@") corpse. There is a 20% chance that the centre will have a secret door; beware.               |
| Random dungeon feature | No             | Yes                  |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | At the centre of the room is a [cloud](/wiki/Cloud "Cloud"), [lava](/wiki/Lava "Lava"), [ice](/wiki/Ice "Ice"), [water](/wiki/Water "Water") or a [tree](/wiki/Tree "Tree"). The room will always have an odd width and height so that there is an exact center point.                                                                               |
| L-shaped               | Yes            | Yes                  | -----    \|...\|    \|...\|    \|...---- \|......\| \|......\| \|......\| --------                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | There are four rotations of this type of room.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| Blocked center         | Yes            | Yes                  | ----------- \|.........\| \|.........\| \|.........\| \|...[}](/wiki/Lava "Lava")[}](/wiki/Lava "Lava")[}](/wiki/Lava "Lava")...\| \|...[}](/wiki/Lava "Lava")[}](/wiki/Lava "Lava")[}](/wiki/Lava "Lava")...\| \|...[}](/wiki/Lava "Lava")[}](/wiki/Lava "Lava")[}](/wiki/Lava "Lava")...\| \|.........\| \|.........\| \|.........\| -----------                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | A 9×9 room with the central 3×3 spaces filled with lava (70% chance), walls (15% chance) or water (15% chance).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| Circular, small        | Yes            | Yes                  |   ---    --.--  --...-- \|.....\| --...--  --.--    ---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| Circular, medium       | Yes            | Yes                  |   -----    --...--  --.....-- \|.......\| \|.......\| \|.......\| --.....--  --...--    -----                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| Circular, big          | Yes            | Yes                  |    -----     ---...---   -.......-  --.......-- \|.........\| \|.........\| \|.........\| --.......--  -.......-   ---...---     -----                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| T-shaped               | Yes            | Yes                  |    -----       \|...\|       \|...\|    ----...---- \|.........\| \|.........\| \|.........\| -----------                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | There are four rotations of this type of room.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| S-shaped               | Yes            | Yes                  |    --------    \|......\|    \|......\| ----......\| \|......---- \|......\| \|......\| --------                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | There are four rotations and reflections of this type of room.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| Cross                  | Yes            | Yes                  |    -----       \|...\|       \|...\|    ----...---- \|.........\| \|.........\| \|.........\| ----...----    \|...\|       \|...\|       -----                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| Four-leaf clover       | Yes            | Yes                  | ----- ----- \|...\| \|...\| \|...---...\| \|.........\| ---.....---   \|.....\|   ---.....--- \|.........\| \|...---...\| \|...\| \|...\| ----- -----                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| Water-surrounded vault | No             | No                   | [}](/wiki/Moat "Moat")[}](/wiki/Moat "Moat")[}](/wiki/Moat "Moat")[}](/wiki/Moat "Moat")[}](/wiki/Moat "Moat")[}](/wiki/Moat "Moat") [}](/wiki/Moat "Moat")----[}](/wiki/Moat "Moat") [}](/wiki/Moat "Moat")\|[(](/wiki/Chest "Chest")[(](/wiki/Chest "Chest")\|[}](/wiki/Moat "Moat") [}](/wiki/Moat "Moat")\|[(](/wiki/Chest "Chest")[(](/wiki/Chest "Chest")\|[}](/wiki/Moat "Moat") [}](/wiki/Moat "Moat")----[}](/wiki/Moat "Moat") [}](/wiki/Moat "Moat")[}](/wiki/Moat "Moat")[}](/wiki/Moat "Moat")[}](/wiki/Moat "Moat")[}](/wiki/Moat "Moat")[}](/wiki/Moat "Moat") | The room is not connected to the other rooms, but may appear adjacent to a corridor. It can generate alongside an actual [vault](/wiki/Vault "Vault"). It contains a [giant zombie](/wiki/Giant_zombie "Giant zombie"), [ettin zombie](/wiki/Ettin_zombie "Ettin zombie") or [vampire lord](/wiki/Vampire_lord "Vampire lord") guarding four chests. |

## 더 보기

- [Random vault (UnNetHack)](/wiki/Random_vault_\(UnNetHack\) "Random vault (UnNetHack)")
html:
Themed room/ko

From NetHackWiki
< Themed room
Jump to navigation Jump to search

The following information pertains to an upcoming version (NetHack 3.7.0). If this version is now released, please verify that it is still accurate, then update the page to incorporate this information.

테마 방은 일반 직사각형 방과는 달리 희귀한 방입니다. 일반 랜덤 방 대신 테마 방이 배치되려고 할 확률이 1033분의 33(약 31분의 1)입니다. 테마가 있는 방 중에는 단순히 특이한 모양인 것도 있고, 다른 곳과는 달리 내용이 있는 것도 있습니다. 일부 테마 방은 특별한 방으로 더욱 변할수가 있습니다.

테마 방 목록

Name Can be special Normal room contents Map Notes
일반적인 무작위 방 Yes Yes

흔한 직사각형 방입니다.

가짜 Delphi Yes Yes

A 11×9 room with a 3×3 room in its center, imitating Delphi.

Room in a room Yes Yes

A random room with a random subroom

Huge room Yes Yes

90% 확률로 subroom을 포함하는 아주 큰 방입니다.

Ice room No Yes

바닥이 얼음으로 뒤덮여 있습니다.

Boulder room No No

Each floor space in the room has a 30% chance to have a boulder or rolling boulder trap.

거미 둥지 No No

Each floor space in the room has a 30% chance to have a web, with a giant spider sitting on it.

Trap room No No

Each floor space in the room has a 30% chance to have a trap. All of these traps will be of the same type, and they may have corpses and possessions on an eligible level. They can be arrow traps, dart traps, falling rock traps, bear traps, land mines, sleeping gas traps, rust traps or anti-magic fields.

Buried treasure Yes Yes

3d4개의 무작위 물체를 포함하는 바닥에 묻힌 상자가 있습니다.

Massacre No No

There are 5d5 player monster or quest guardian corpses on the floor.

Pillars No No
------------
|..........|
|..........|
|..--..--..|
|..--..--..|
|..........|
|..........|
|..--..--..|
|..--..--..|
|..........|
|..........|
------------

The pillars will be lava 1/7 of the time, water 1/7 of the time or trees 1/7 of the time.

Statuary No No

5d5개의 석상과 d3개의 석상 함정이 있습니다.

Light source No No

불이 켜진 기름 램프를 포함하는 항상 어두운 방입니다.

Temple of the gods No No

There is an altar of each alignment. The room is not an actual temple and does not contain a priest.

Mausoleum No No
-------
|.....|
|.---.|
|.|.|.|
|.---.|
|.....|
-------

There is a 50% chance that there will be a lich, mummy, vampire or zombie sealed in the centre of the room; otherwise there will be an @ corpse. There is a 20% chance that the centre will have a secret door; beware.

Random dungeon feature No Yes

At the centre of the room is a cloud, lava, ice, water or a tree. The room will always have an odd width and height so that there is an exact center point.

L-shaped Yes Yes
-----   
|...|   
|...|   
|...----
|......|
|......|
|......|
--------

There are four rotations of this type of room.

Blocked center Yes Yes
-----------
|.........|
|.........|
|.........|
|...}}}...|
|...}}}...|
|...}}}...|
|.........|
|.........|
|.........|
-----------

A 9×9 room with the central 3×3 spaces filled with lava (70% chance), walls (15% chance) or water (15% chance).

Circular, small Yes Yes
  ---  
 --.-- 
--...--
|.....|
--...--
 --.-- 
  ---  
Circular, medium Yes Yes
  -----  
 --...-- 
--.....--
|.......|
|.......|
|.......|
--.....--
 --...-- 
  -----  
Circular, big Yes Yes
   -----   
 ---...--- 
 -.......- 
--.......--
|.........|
|.........|
|.........|
--.......--
 -.......- 
 ---...--- 
   -----   
T-shaped Yes Yes
   -----   
   |...|   
   |...|   
----...----
|.........|
|.........|
|.........|
-----------

There are four rotations of this type of room.

S-shaped Yes Yes
   --------
   |......|
   |......|
----......|
|......----
|......|
|......|
--------

There are four rotations and reflections of this type of room.

Cross Yes Yes
   -----   
   |...|   
   |...|   
----...----
|.........|
|.........|
|.........|
----...----
   |...|   
   |...|   
   -----   
Four-leaf clover Yes Yes
----- -----
|...| |...|
|...---...|
|.........|
---.....---
  |.....|  
---.....---
|.........|
|...---...|
|...| |...|
----- -----
Water-surrounded vault No No
}}}}}}
}----}
}|((|}
}|((|}
}----}
}}}}}}

The room is not connected to the other rooms, but may appear adjacent to a corridor. It can generate alongside an actual vault. It contains a giant zombie, ettin zombie or vampire lord guarding four chests.

더 보기

  • Random vault (UnNetHack)
